issue.title: [R] Warn if an SF column is made into a table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14258](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14258). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
add a warning about sf when encountered now that we don't do that by default
